name: WP RunKeeper Button
author: Matt Chan

sections.description: Adds a RunKeeper Healthy button prepended to single post content. The Healthy button is loaded directly from RunKeeper.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp_runkeeper_button directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Done.
sections.faq:
Something afoul with the code?

Please post issues on the GitHub repo.
https://github.com/mattchan/wp_runkeeper_button/issues

What is the RunKeeper Healthy button?

The RunKeeper Healthy button is a bookmarklet button that enables people to share items with their Street Teammates. Whether items are fitness tips, healthy recipes, or inspiring stories, the Healthy button lets you promote items in your FitnessFeed on RunKeeper’s website.

For more information, check out their Health Graph API: http://developer.runkeeper.com/healthgraph/healthy-button-plugin

Do I work for RunKeeper?

Nope. I wrote this on my own.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First version. Displays button at top of single posts (no pages).

short_description: Adds a RunKeeper Healthy button to the top of single posts.
